name: GDPR / DSGVo Secure Google Maps
author: UDLIS IT-Solutions

sections.description:
GDPR / DSGVo Secure Google Maps Insert Google Maps or any other Code to your page easily and with optimization fort the GDPR Law (Privacy Policy).
The Map code will start loading after the user clicks and accepts it.

GDPR / DSGVo Google Maps Demo

This GDPR / DSGVo Secure Google Map Plugin helps you make your Website or Blog safer for your visitors and clients.

GDPR / DSGVo Secure Google Map is a fresh and well optimized plugin with purpose to make the Web Safer.
How it works GDPR Secure Google Maps

ShortCode
[google_map_click_load]

How it works

Plugin Features

  • Easy use
  • Plug and Play
  • You can Insert the Google Map Code
  • No Google API Required
  • Secure and optimized for Privacy Policy
  • Made in Germany
  • Output with Shord Code
  • Editable Button text
  • Cross browser’s compatible

Made and powered with Love from UDLIS IT-Solutions
We provide no free support.

If you want to need any new feature or any question than you can email on info@it-usmt.de
